title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8203.2 - Collection of data
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8203.2 - Collection of data

State Regulations
(a) The council
shall receive from participating agencies only those data which are relevant
and necessary to accomplish the intended purposes of CYIMIS as such purposes
are set forth in Executive Law, section 445. (b) The council shall not collect individual
identifying data. The council shall use encoded child data elements and council
internal identification numbers to identify data subjects. (c) All data shall be collected subject to
applicable confidentiality statutes and regulations of the participating
agencies. (d) The council shall not
collect data directly from any data subject. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8203.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
